basic_information.scholarship_name: Cora Morton Loafman Scholarship for Human Environmental Sciences
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Cora Morton Loafman Scholarship for HES

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students who are pursuing their degree within Human Environmental Sciences department. Eligibility Requirements Pursuing a degree within the Human Environmental Sciences Department at UCO Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
